mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `weixiufuwu`,`xiangmutype` WHERE xiangmutype.xid = weixiufuwu.xid AND weixiufuwu.xid = '${xid}'
SELECT * FROM weixiufuwu,xiangmutype WHERE weixiufuwu.xid = xiangmutype.xid AND weixiufuwu.xid IN ('${list}')
select * from xiangmutype where xfid = '${xfid}' AND xid = '${xid}'
